text: Valentina Kevliyan (or Valentina Kevlian, ; born March 11, 1978 in Plovdiv) is a Bulgarian rhythmic gymnast. At the 1996 Olympic Games, held in Atlanta, she won a silver medal as part of the Bulgarian rhythmic gymnastics group (along with teammates Ina Delcheva, Maria Koleva, Maya Tabakova, Ivelina Taleva and Viara Vatashka). == See also == * Gymnastics at the 1996 Summer Olympics – Women's rhythmic group all-around == References == == External links == * Valentina Kevliyan at FIG * * Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Bulgarian rhythmic gymnasts Category:Gymnasts at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic gymnasts of Bulgaria Category:Sportspeople from Plovdiv
title: Valentina Kevliyan
